sentences.sentence: It is applicable to softening conditioning shampoo, hair conditioner, hairdressing gel, elastin, hairstyling gel.
sentences.translation: 这适用于软化调理洗发水，护发素，美容发胶，弹性蛋白，发型凝胶。

sentences.sentence: Smoking damages the elastin that helps keep facial skin flexible.
sentences.translation: 吸烟会破坏帮助皮肤保持弹性的弹性蛋白。

sentences.sentence: Smoking also damages collagen and elastin — fibers that give your skin its strength and elasticity.
sentences.translation: 吸烟也会破坏胶原蛋白和弹性蛋白——纤维细胞，它将使你的皮肤具有韧性和弹性。
